description:
The battle for the sprint result has begun. Hakone Academy sends its captain and sprinter Izumida against Kyoto Fushimi`s Kishigami Komari, the man obsessed with Izumida`s "ultimate muscles!" Izumida recalls how Ashikiba and Kuroda encouraged him when he lost the previous year`s Inter-high and felt conflicted about whether or not he was worthy of captaining the team. Carrying all his guilt and resolve on his back, Izumida sprints ahead! But Kishigami`s obsession with the "ultimate muscles" drives him to keep up!
Source: crunchyroll
